A basic starter pack for HUD Maker assets.
Abductedious (Virgo VS The Zodiac)

Very clean with subtle ornaments and a nice pallete, not too bright, not too dark.
Ideal settings: Sci-fi, modern, magical, real world, but doesn't look out of place in traditional RTP.
A bright and powerful collection of HUD pieces that can be used to construct a modern-styled HUD!

Shonnen AK (Deviant Art)
An outstanding HUD pack containing four base HUDs to choose from! Mix and match the pieces to make your own amazing HUD from tons of unique gauges, crazy backgrounds, and beautiful art!
A collection of stylish assets that fit well with steampunk, fantasy, and sci-fi settings! This is a must download for all sorts of games!
